effect.sun-moon: Whenever this Pokémon's stats would be raised, they are instead lowered by the same amount, and vice versa.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Whenever this Pokémon's stats would be raised, they are instead lowered by the same amount, and vice versa.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Whenever this Pokémon's stats would be raised, they are instead lowered by the same amount, and vice versa.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
